hcc_text: Esplanade is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
info: At Esplanade at Williamsbridge Road and Pelham Parkway Wb, there were 2 severe injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Esplanade at Williamsbridge Road and Pelham Parkway Wb
